prep.description: Get butter to room temperature; take it out of the fridge for a few hours until it is very soft to the touch
Place butter in a large mixing bowl
Use the microplane to zest the lemon over the butter
Add sugar to the mixing bowl; mix until well-combined
Crack the egg and add it to the bowl
Add vanilla extract to the bowl; mix until well-combined
Place blueberries into a separate bowl
Add a quarter-cup flour to the blueberry bowl; toss the blueberries in the flour until coated
Place the remaining flour into a separate bowl
Add salt and baking powder to the flour bowl; whisk until combined
Position the center-rack in the oven; start pre-heating to 375 degrees F
Slowly add dry flour mixture to the wet ingredients; alternate with pouring in milk; mix until well-combined
Line 12 cup muffin tin with baking cups
Use the disher to evenly distribute batter to baking cups

cook.description: Place muffin tin into oven and bake for 26 minutes
Check for internal temperature of 209 degrees F in the center of the largest muffin
